Title: "TOP SECRET - FOR YOUR EYES ONLY (DO NOT OPEN UNLESS ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY)"
Text:
Welcome to the digital documentation of SR-461's classified manual. Only members of our top-secret organization have access to this interface, so if you're not one of us, scram before we track you down.

Now, for my fellow members, let's get down to business. As outlined in Article 1, it is crucial to differentiate between Suppressor 1 and Suppressor 2. Mixing them up could lead to disastrous consequences. We don't want that, do we?

Moving on to Article 2 - surprise, there are three suppressors in total! And they all need monthly check-ups and maintenance. Don't forget to download your keys from the main console before you head over to inspect and update their logs.

But hold your horses, folks. Before you start celebrating with sugary carbonated beverages, know that these activities will be recorded and could disqualify you from the end-of-the-month raffle event. Yes, even the daily intake of smelly rice noodles in the conference room is a no-go. No amount of aromatic reagents can cover up that stench.

And speaking of stench, let's talk about puns and dad jokes. We all love them (or pretend not to), but too much can be a nuisance for everyone else. That's why anyone caught making puns or cracking corny jokes will have to suffer through a week's worth as punishment. Just try not to repeat them â€” that's just unforgivable.

Lastly, remember that this manual can only be adjusted three times per quarter. Any additional changes will have to wait until the next quarter.

So there you have it, folks. The 21 articles carefully crafted by the brilliant minds of SR-461. Let's all abide by them and avoid any unpleasant consequences.
